urls.title: China Never Reported Existence of Coronavirus to World Health Organization
urls.description: Contrary to claims from both Chinese officials and the World Health Organization, China did not report the existence of the coronavirus in late 2019.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
So we are clear, now we know that China was an even worse actor in this global pandemic then we originally thought before? Right?

China Never Reported Existence of Coronavirus to World Health Organization https://t.co/0ttvnYI5Yn
